original_text: And he spread the tent over the tabernacle and put the covering of the tent over it, as the Lord had commanded Moses.
korean_text: 또 성막 위에 막을 펴고 그 위에 덮개를 덮으니 여호와께서 모세에게 명령하신 대로 되니라

sentences.original_text: And he spread the tent over the tabernacle
and put the covering of the tent over it
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 위에 장막의 덮개를 덮었습니다

sentences.original_text: as the Lord had commanded Moses
